ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T16:32:57 [Issue ID 4000-537287] urn:comicvine:4000-537287 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-17 13:45:47. [Issue ID 1594111]
ComicInfo.Summary:
This issue is filled to the brim with some many World Warriors, we can't possibly name them all... but we'll try! Ryu, Ken, Chun-li, and Guile! Ibuki, Makoto, and Elena! Sakura and Karin! Alex! Rainbow Mika! Necro! The Mad Gear gang! The Secret Society! And tons more! Don't' miss the most jam-packed Street Fighter comic EVER!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Regular Story Cover | Genzoman | 1 | B | Ultra Jam Puzzle Cover B (6 of 12) | Jeffrey Cruz | 2 | C | Movie Cover C | Jeffrey Cruz | 3 | D | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Homage Cover D | Long Vo | 4 | Notes:
Cover B is part seven of a twelve part connecting cover image made up of all the Ultra Jam Puzzle covers for issues #1-12. The Movie Cover C is a homage of the movie poster for Street Fighter. The 1:10 Retailer Incentive Homage Cover D is a homage of the cover of WildC.A.T.s: Covert Action Teams #1.
